00054 struct AppPolicy : Policy {
00055   static void init_options() {
00056     cmdline_desc().add_options()
00057       ("root", str()->default_value("fs/local"), "root directory for local "
00058           "broker (if relative, it's relative to the installation directory")
00059       ;
00060     alias("port", "DfsBroker.Local.Port");
00061     alias("root", "DfsBroker.Local.Root");
00062     alias("workers", "DfsBroker.Local.Workers");
00063     alias("reactors", "DfsBroker.Local.Reactors");
00064   }
00065 };
00066 
00067 typedef Meta::list<AppPolicy, DfsBrokerPolicy, DefaultCommPolicy> Policies;
00068 
00069 } // local namespace
00070 
00071 
00072 int main(int argc, char **argv) {
00073   try {
00074     init_with_policies<Policies>(argc, argv);
00075     int port = get_i16("port");
00076     int worker_count = get_i32("workers");
00077 
00078     Comm *comm = Comm::instance();
00079     ApplicationQueuePtr app_queue = new ApplicationQueue(worker_count);
00080     BrokerPtr broker = new LocalBroker(properties);
00081     ConnectionHandlerFactoryPtr chfp =
00082         new DfsBroker::ConnectionHandlerFactory(comm, app_queue, broker);
00083     InetAddr listen_addr(INADDR_ANY, port);
00084 
00085     comm->listen(listen_addr, chfp);
00086     app_queue->join();
00087   }
00088   catch (Exception &e) {
00089     HT_ERROR_OUT << e << HT_END;
00090     return 1;
00091   }
00092   return 0;
00093 }
